title: Microelectronic Circuit Design 5th c2016 Jaeger + Blalock txtbk

Microelectronic Circuit Design, 5th Edition (c2016), textbook by Richard C. Jaeger & Travis N. Blalock.

TEXTBOOK INFO:
5th: <a href=" http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073529605/information_center_view0/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073529605/information_center_view0/index.html</a>

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
PART ONE - SOLID-STATE ELECTRONICS AND DEVICES
 1. Introduction to Electronics
 2. Solid-State Electronics
 3. Solid-State Diodes and Diode Circuits
 4. Field-Effect Transistors
 5. Bipolar Junction Transistors
PART TWO - DIGITAL ELECTRONICS
 6. Introduction to Digital Electronics
 7. Complementary MOS (CMOS) Logic Design
 8. MOS Memory Circuits
 9. Bipolar Logic Circuits
PART THREE - ANALOG ELECTRONICS
 10. Analog Systems and Ideal Operational Amplifiers
 11. Nonideal Operational Amplifiers and Feedback Amplifier Stability
 12. Operational Amplifier Applications
 13. Small-Signal Modeling and Linear Amplification
 14. Single-Transistor Amplifiers
 15. Differential Amplifiers and Operational Amplifier Design
 16. Analog Integrated Circuit Design Techniques
 17. Amplifier Frequency Response
 18. Transistor Feedback Amplifiers and Oscillators
APPENDICES:
 A: Standard Discrete Component Values
 B: Solid-State Device Models and SPICE Simulation Parameters
 C: Two-Port Review

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
